title: Episode 180: Sherri Papini - Part 1
description:
A picture-perfect family was turned upside down when its “super mom” went missing. For three long weeks, they feared the worst and raised nearly $50 grand for the search efforts. When she reappeared out of nowhere, alive and mostly well, she had a story for investigators that set the community on edge. What really happened after she went missing?
 
Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
-Sign up with Stamps.com and use promo code CREEPY for a special offer that includes a 4- week trial, free postage, and a digital scale
-Go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code CREEPY at checkout for 15% off your order
-Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows for our listeners at Helixsleep.com/creepy
Show Notes
